homePage.homeText3: We created this app to help all fellow Japanese learners on their path to fluency.
homePage.homeText4: Learning Japanese might be difficult and monotonous, but in this place we'll speed up a little and have fun... unless you prefer slower pace, then don't worry - everything can be customized. If you wish to read and write like a master, then check out our Typer tool! It'll help you learn to connect kana with its way of reading.
homePage.homeText5: You don't need to track your own progress, the app will adjust to you and cover all basic information in the Progress tab.
homePage.homeText6: Hopefully you'll have a good time learning Japanese and stick with us!

accountDetails.accoutDesc: This webside provides info about your account.

termsOfService.tos: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
termsOfService.tosDesc: This document governs the terms of use of the Kana Typer application and explains how user data is processed. By using the Kana Typer application, the user accepts the following terms.
termsOfService.tosTerms: Terms of Use for the Kana Typer Application
termsOfService.tosTerm11: The Kana Typer application is available to users with a Google account.
termsOfService.tosTerm12: Using the application must align with its intended purpose, namely providing access to the features offered by the application.
termsOfService.tosTerm21: The Kana Typer application is provided 'as is'.
termsOfService.tosTerm22: The application owner is not responsible for any damages resulting from the use of the application, including data loss or other technical issues.
termsOfService.tosTerm31: By using the application, the user accepts the terms and conditions of Google services, available at: https://policies.google.com/terms.
termsOfService.tosTerm41: The terms of use for the Kana Typer application may be amended in the future. Changes to the terms will be published in the application, and users will be informed upon their next login.
termsOfService.tosPolicy11: The Kana Typer application does not collect, store, or process users' personal data.
termsOfService.tosPolicy2: Logging in with a Google Account
termsOfService.tosPolicy21: The application only allows logging in with a Google account.
termsOfService.tosPolicy22: Authentication data is processed solely by Google's service to verify the user. The Kana Typer application does not store or retain users' personal data.
termsOfService.tosPolicy31: The Kana Typer application does not use cookies to track user activity.
termsOfService.tosPolicy32: Session data (e.g., session duration) is temporarily stored to ensure the application functions properly and is deleted after the session ends.
termsOfService.tosPolicy41: The application uses Firebase, a service provided by Google, to handle login, data storage, and other application features.
termsOfService.tosPolicy42: Firebase may process data in accordance with Google's Privacy Policy, available at: https://policies.google.com/privacy.
termsOfService.tosPolicy51: Since the Kana Typer application does not store personal data, users do not need to submit any requests regarding access, modification, or deletion of their data.
termsOfService.tosPolicy61: The Privacy Policy may be amended in the future. Changes will be published in the application, and the user will be informed upon their next login.
